<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mods and Addons </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns a list of files present in the addon.<br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Querying protected <tt>.ebo</tt> addons returns empty array <tt>[]</tt>.</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[addonFiles]] [pboPrefix, fileExtension] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [pboPrefix, fileExtension] - [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pboPrefix: [[String]] - addon prefix available from [[allAddonsInfo]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> fileExtension (Optional): [[String]] - file extension to filter results, for example <tt>".paa"</tt> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[String]]s</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[addonFiles]] ["a3\3den\", ".paa"];
<template lineStart="1"><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>/*
	[
		"a3\3den\data\attributes\formation\ech_left_ca.paa",

		...
	]
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>*</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>/</value></part></template></code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
